p: Besides the triterpenes, royleanone-like diterpenes were also very effective in elastase inhibition. These compounds, including ( 4) (52.8 3.8%), ( 2) (39.2 5.2%) and ( 3) (38.3 4.4%), showed highest elastase inhibitory activity ( Figure 6(C)). Thus, elastase inhibitors obtained from Plectranthus spp. plants are possible candidates for the treatment or prevention of skin photoageing.
